appDesc.message: Post the current page title and URL to X in one click.

optionsSubtitle.message: Configure how the post text is generated.

languageHint.message: Choose UI language for this options page. “System” follows your Chrome language.

templateHelp.message: Use {title}, {url}, {hashtags}. Newlines: actual line breaks, \n, or /n.

hashtagsHint.message: If {hashtags} is in the template, it will be inserted there. Otherwise it will be appended.

previewHint.message: This is a preview using sample title and URL.

openModeHint.message: Choose whether to open X in a new tab or a popup window.
